Description: * *  *   *    *     *      *       *        Job Title*       *      *     *    *   *  *  Lead Application Security Architect (Navitaire)* *  Job Description* *  Passionate. Committed. Fearless.*  Navitaire has been transforming the world of travel since 1993, delivering game-changing technology that supports some of the most innovative airlines and rail carriers around the world. We offer proven solutions to help clients grow their business, reduce costs, capture new revenue sources and connect with digital customers and business partners.* *  Use your passion and creativity to*  help shape the future of travel*   solve critical business challenges*   contribute on a global scale* *  A wholly owned subsidiary of Amadeus, Navitaire has over 600 employees in offices in North America, Europe, Asia and Australia. We have a wide range of careers and opportunities that let you do what you do best, every day. And our fun, casual and fast-paced environment give you the space to grow personally and professionally alongside other industry pioneers.* *  Summary of the role:*  Navitaire is increasing its security posture to support evolving cloud and application transformation and is seeking an experienced Application Security Architect skilled in designing, implementing, and integrating security for complex software projects in the enterprise environment. The Application Security Architect focuses on enhancing and supporting the secure software development lifecycle (SDLC). They are responsible to enable the business through the design and recommendation of new technical and process solutions based on industry best practice and established security standards. Day to day duties include consulting with software architects and engineers, reviewing application code and projects for risk factors, and leading efforts to remediate vulnerabilities and mitigate risk in applications. This role is positioned within the Navitaire CyberSecurity Security Architecture team and will collaborate with stakeholders and technical teams within Navitaire and Amadeus, as well as with strategic third-party partners.* *  In this role you’ll be:*  Consulting on and delivering secure architecture designs in application and software development and deployment, helping to mature company's ability and skill in delivering and running secure applications for public-cloud based solutions.*   Being deeply involved in the cloud readiness and migration process for applications and their environments.*   Designing forward-thinking security services, patterns, standards, and capabilities to maintain compliance and facilitate secure or zero trust application development in support of business goals and objectives including cloud presence.*   Providing guidance for development teams on delivering secure cloud solutions through providing or helping to develop secure coding patterns and example code.*   Acting as subject matter expert for end-to-end application security within the software development lifecycle program, including integrations with identity & access, networking, storage, databases, logging, security and cloud services, CI/CD pipeline, and compute environment details.*   Acting as a mentor to train other engineers, architects, and security personnel around best practices and policies in application security and the software development lifecycle (SDLC).*   Participating in vulnerability identification and management through consulting and direct engagement with applications and their environments. Assisting with vulnerability scanning and penetration testing as needed.*   Helping Navitaire achieve complex regulatory and compliance cybersecurity requirements and objectives through analysis and technical implementation of security policy and controls.*   Proactively assessing and identifying security risk, effectively communicating findings to cybersecurity management, and following established risk management processes.* *  About the ideal candidate:*  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.*   One or more of the following security certifications CISSP, CCSP, CISM. Create your candidate profile, upload your CV and apply.*  Are you the one we are looking for? Apply now!* *  Diversity & Inclusion* *  Amadeus is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer.
